metadata.title: CVE-2016-9866 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. When the arg_separator is differentfrom its default & value, the CSRF token was not properly stripped from thereturn URL of the preference import action. All 4.6.x versions (prior to4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to4.0.10.18) are affected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9866` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.5.1-1').
